home.subtitle: Houses in Rome
home.title: Trastevere Luxury
home.description: Two exclusive properties in the historic heart of Rome, where contemporary design meets tradition
home.aboutDescription: In the heart of Trastevere, steps away from the nightlife but in quiet corners, our houses offer the perfect balance between modern comfort and Roman authenticity. Walk through historic alleys, taste true Roman cuisine in traditional trattorias, and easily reach Piazza Navona, the Pantheon and all the wonders of Rome.
home.locationDescription: Both properties are located in Rome's most characteristic neighborhood, where bohemian atmosphere blends with the millenary history of the eternal city.
home.ctaDescription: Contemporary design or historic charm? Discover which of our properties is right for you.

fienaroli.name: Casa Fienaroli
fienaroli.shortDesc: Contemporary design and exposed beams in the heart of Rome
fienaroli.description: Experience the atmosphere of Trastevere, the heart of Rome, and the comfortable spaces of this beautiful property! Design details and glass walls blend with exposed beams and antique doors of priceless charm.
fienaroli.longDescription:
Experience the atmosphere of Trastevere, the heart of Rome, and the comfortable spaces of this beautiful property! Design details and glass walls blend with exposed beams and antique doors of priceless charm...renovated and furnished with discreet luxury integrated into the environment! The apartment is in an excellent location, a few meters from the nightlife but in a quiet corner, 50 meters from shops, markets and restaurants. With a walk you can reach all the tourist attractions!

**The Space**

Spacious apartment on Via dei Fienaroli, in the center of Trastevere!
A design company has renovated and furnished this large 80 square meter apartment, managing to create a warm and comfortable environment with special furnishings and materials that capture attention!

The entire apartment is for your exclusive use and is composed as follows:
- Large living room with double sofa bed, dining table, TV and air conditioning
- Large fully equipped kitchen counter for preparing meals, equipped with induction plates, **NESPRESSO** coffee machine, oven and dishwasher
- Large room with glass wall with double bed, air conditioning and TV
- Bathroom with large shower cabin, toilet, bidet and sink with wooden base
- Bedroom with double bed (note the headboard) with air conditioning, TV and en-suite bathroom. The private bathroom has a shower cabin, toilet, bidet and sink and has 2 glass walls, a real specialty!

The apartment is equipped with washer/dryer, dishwasher, wi-fi, TV in all rooms and a kitchen equipped for preparing meals.
Utilities, bed linen and dishes are included in the service.

The apartment is in a fantastic location, a few meters from the nightlife but in a quiet corner from noise, 50 meters from the house there are shops, markets, bars and delicious restaurants. A car is not necessary and with a short walk you can reach Piazza Navona, Piazza Venezia, etc.!

**Tourist accommodation facility authorized - ID 708**

**Guest Access**

Guests have access to the entire apartment!
We ask our guests to leave the house as they found it and to treat it with the same care we treat it!

**Other Things to Keep in Mind**

The location is strategic and the apartment is new, it's an opportunity not to be missed!

If you want, we can organize:
- pick-up to/from the airport
- individual or group Italian/Roman cooking classes
- Tours of Rome and other cities

moro.name: Casa Moro
moro.shortDesc: 15th century ceilings and modern luxury between Santa Maria and Trilussa fountain
moro.description: In the heart of Trastevere we have renovated this apartment with fine materials, combining modern and luxurious solutions, maintaining the wooden ceilings from the 1400s.
moro.longDescription:
In the heart of Trastevere between Santa Maria and Trilussa fountain we have renovated this apartment with fine materials, combining modern and luxurious solutions, maintaining the wooden ceilings from the 1400s and part of the original floors, where you can breathe a particular atmosphere of papal Rome.

Stroll through the alleys and taste the real Roman cuisine in the many traditional trattorias. Cross the Tiber and quickly reach Piazza Navona, the Pantheon and Roman wonders.

**The Space**

Luxury apartment in Via del Moro, in the center of Trastevere!
A design company has renovated and furnished this beautiful apartment, managing to create a warm and comfortable environment with special furniture and materials that capture attention!

The entire apartment is for your exclusive use and is composed as follows:
- Living room with double sofa bed, dining table, TV and air conditioning
- A fully equipped kitchen for preparing meals, equipped with induction plates, NESPRESSO coffee machine, oven and dishwasher
- Bathroom with large shower cabin, toilet, bidet and sink
- Large bedroom with double bed with air conditioning, TV and en-suite bathroom. The private bathroom has a shower cabin, toilet, bidet and sink and has 2 glass walls, a real specialty! The bedroom continues into a large and very comfortable wardrobe, perfect for having all the desired space to store everything!

The apartment is equipped with washer/dryer, dishwasher, wi-fi, two TVs and a kitchen equipped for preparing meals.
Utilities, bed linen and dishes are included in the service.

The apartment is in a fantastic location, a few meters from the nightlife. 50 meters from the house there are shops, markets, bars and delicious restaurants. A car is not necessary and with a short walk you can reach Piazza Navona, Piazza Venezia, and all the major points of interest!

**Guest Access**

Guests have access to the entire apartment!
We ask our guests to leave the house as they found it and to treat it with the same care we treat it!

**Other Things to Keep in Mind**

The location is strategic and the apartment is new, it's an opportunity not to be missed!

If you want, we can organize:
- pick-up to/from the airport
- individual or group Italian/Roman cooking classes
- Tours of Rome and other cities
